segments.text: I walk into the kitchen and see the woman standing there drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that dish towel and the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at the sink behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring out over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in it, but she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, there's a boy on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl is standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky while the mom is oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all calm and pretty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is about to turn into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
